page.title: 06SCHOOLS
page.content:
Education for Primary age children is provided at{Barkisland}C.E.(A) School, {Norland}C.E.(C) School,{Ripponden}J & I School,and{Triangle}C.E.(C) School. A Comprehensive School at Sowerby, {Ryburn Valley High,}serves a large part of the Ryburn Valley and surrounding district. Close liaison is maintained between the Primary Schools and Ryburn VHS.
Children and staff from the Primary schools meet at many sporting fixtures, including football, netball, swimming, cross-country and cricket. Children who receive instrumental tuition on{orchestral instruments}meet together at Ryburn VHS to play together. Many will continue to receive tuition at Ryburn VHS and will play in one of the school's successful {bands.
